scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:host & pnpm run dev:login & pnpm run dev:profile
scripts.dev:script-poc: pnpm --filter script-host start & pnpm --filter next-mfe dev
scripts.dev:next-poc: pnpm --filter next-host dev & pnpm --filter next-mfe dev
scripts.dev:single-spa: pnpm run dev:root-config & pnpm run dev:mfe1
